posts.post_content:
Pair with [Mirran Crusader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mirran Crusader). Double strike gives you 2 cards for each attack with protection against all those zombie and vamp decks.   
  
Glech, yes, apparently the abilities do stack, so each card would get the triggered draw ability twice. Play an [Artful Dodge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Artful Dodge) or [Ghostform](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ghostform) to make them unblockable, attack with both, and you can draw 4 cards.
posts.html:
Pair with Mirran Crusader. Double strike gives you 2 cards for each attack with protection against all those zombie and vamp decks.

Glech, yes, apparently the abilities do stack, so each card would get the triggered draw ability twice. Play an Artful Dodge or Ghostform to make them unblockable, attack with both, and you can draw 4 cards.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: RFox1000 (6/19/2012 6:06:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
So now that RtR is pretty much out and about, I was looking for something new to do with most of my red stuff... I pulled a bunch of izzet rares at the prerelease and then i found this card and i was like, whoa...
  
   
Goes alone nicely with new favorites like [guttersnipe](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=guttersnipe) and [lobber crew](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=lobber crew), [hypersonic dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=hypersonic dragon) and [niv-mizzet, dracogenius](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=niv-mizzet, dracogenius) too. It goes really well with the new niv-mizzet actually, its like these two were made for eachother!
  
   
Also, this card gives me a new hope for my [vexing devil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=vexing devil), which has needed a boost since coming out of my sacrifice deck that was 70% scars of mirrodin. Just bond vexing devil to the lookout and if a person takes the 4dmg, you draw a card as you sac the devil then the lookout is ready to bond to something else.

posts.post_content:
I love this guy! He is really good with [Niv-Mizzet the Firemind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Niv-Mizzet the Firemind), [Delver of Secrets](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Delver of Secrets), [Gelectrode](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gelectrode), [Invisible Stalker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Invisible Stalker), etc.  
  
I have a question though, how does his ability work with "enters the battlefield" effects such as the ones on [Sparkmage Apprentice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sparkmage Apprentice), [Blisterstick Shaman](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blisterstick Shaman), and [Kessig Malcontents](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kessig Malcontents)?
